Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Two silent, bright white lights that hovered and then moved away rapidly in irregular flight path
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Prescott
There were no other sightings in Prescott on or around June 10th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi am currently on a camping trip south of prescott az. last night i went to bed soon after midnight. because there isn't any chance of rain i set up my tent without the rainfly so i could see the stars. i'm unsure of the time but i estimate sometime between 2:30 and 4 a.m. i woke up having to use the bathroom. lying on my back i was looking up at the stars when i noticed a brighter than usual star directly above me. i have no idea how high it was because it only appeared to be a star. it was a very bright white, almost with a blue tint to it. i don't know the location of constellations other than a fewmajor ones and the north star so it didn't occur to me that it could be anything other than a star. then it started moving maybe two or three minutes after i initially noticed it. it was faster than any plane i have ever seen up here, and that comparison includes 2 fighter jets i saw last year, (f-16's i think). i would say it was going a little faster than the jets did. it moved in a nne direction, in a straight line initially, then after it had crossed about 1\3 of the horizon it began to zig left and right in about 1 second durations, doing the same angle of change each time and continuing nne overall. each turn might have been 5 degrees or so. it only took about 20 seconds for it to go beyond the horizon i could see. i was more alert and scanned the sky for a little while and saw another light maybe 5 minutes later i noticed another stationary light is similar brightness wnw of me. i watched it for a few minutes and then it started moving at about the same speed to the right across the horizon from my perspective. i was only able to see it for a few seconds before its path took it behind a mountain that blocked any more view of it. there was no moon out, no clouds, no wind and no other lights like planes at that time. i didn't hear any sound at all i would associate with aircraft, just very silent. i intend to be up here camping for a few more days so i would be happy to show an investigator where i am or provide gps coordinates.
